citeinfo.origin: Far Eastern Regional Hydrometeorlogical Institute (FERHRI), 24 Fontannaya Street, Vladivostok, Russia 690600
citeinfo.title: Oceanographic Database (1894-1987) for the Bering Sea

descript.abstract: There are about 40,000 oceanographic stations for the period 1894-1987. 3,500 stations are available for the period 1986-1996 from the Pacific Research Oceanographic Institute. Temperature, salinity, oxygen are the major parameters, but some additional measurements of chemical parameters are available.
descript.purpose: Investigation of the large-scale variability of environmental conditions of the Bering Sea region. These data are not available for analysis but can be processed in Russia, and results could be published.

idinfo.accconst: These data are classified for foreign users. Russian scientists can process these data and results of research will be available.
idinfo.useconst: These data are classified for foreign users. Russian scientists can process these data and results of research will be available.
